summary: This document consists of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. The forms record inmate counts by housing unit and include operational assignments, with one roster noting a 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide or unassigned) category. This appears to be routine prison administrative documentation from the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with counts recorded by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
Forms include an inmate roster with a category marked 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide or unassigned).
Documents show routine prison administrative procedures including unit counts and inmate assignments.
All inmate names and officer names are redacted or not listed in the provided text.
The documents originate from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York where Epstein was held.
